title: SWIM: Semantic Web Intelligent Monitor (Sovereign)
description: Unbreakable, AI-powered semantic web monitoring and strategic pattern recognition.

targetUrl.title: Target URL(s)
targetUrl.description: The URL(s) of the page(s) you want to monitor. Supports batch processing.

preset.title: Preset Strategy
preset.description: Select a monitoring strategy tailored for specific use cases.

cssSelector.title: CSS Selector
cssSelector.description: Restrict monitoring to specific parts of the page. Leave empty for whole page.

useVisualProof.title: Enable Visual Proof
useVisualProof.description: Capture context-aware screenshots highlight changes in Red and identifiers in Blue.

waitForSelector.title: Wait for Selector
waitForSelector.description: Optional: Wait for this CSS selector before taking the screenshot (useful for slow dynamic content).

minSeverityToAlert.title: Min Severity Threshold
minSeverityToAlert.description: Filter noise: Only alert if change score is above this value (0-100).

useAi.title: Use AI Analysis
useAi.description: Enable AI to interpret and summarize changes (recommended for business users).

enableHealing.title: Sovereign: Enable Semantic Healing
enableHealing.description: Automatically recover from website structural changes using AI self-correction.

generateDashboard.title: Victory Lap: Generate Hub Dashboard
generateDashboard.description: Create a premium, dark-mode 'War Room' HTML report at the end of the run.

apiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
apiKey.description: Required if AI Analysis is enabled.

slackWebhookUrl.title: Slack Webhook URL
slackWebhookUrl.description: Send rich, color-coded alerts directly to your Slack channel.

discordWebhookUrl.title: Discord Webhook URL
discordWebhookUrl.description: Send rich, color-coded alerts directly to your Discord channel.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Recommended for high-frequency or multi-target monitoring.

historyDepth.title: History Depth
historyDepth.description: Number of historical snapshots to retain (prevents drift).

storageGroomingDays.title: Storage Grooming (Days)
storageGroomingDays.description: Automatically prune snapshots and history older than this many days.
